attributes.action: say That MPs donate their expenses to pay for the equipment our troops are desperate for
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Its a disgrace that troops who risk their lives have to beg borrow and steal for the equipment they need to carry out this governments policies while MP's live off the fat of the land  with the bankers

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
